   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% File: 
   23: %%%
   24: %%% Description:
   25: %%% 
   26: %%%
   27: %%% The suites used for the test are located in the data directory.
   28: %%%
   29: %%% The group(s) and case(s) are specified according to this:
   30: %%%
   31: %%% Tests = ct_groups:find_groups(Mod, GroupPaths, TestCases, GroupDef)
   32: %%%
   33: %%% GroupPaths = GroupPath | [GroupPath]
   34: %%% GroupPath = atom() | [atom()]
   35: %%%
   36: %%% CT will find all paths that include GroupPath. GroupPath can be a
   37: %%% single group, or a list of groups along the path to TestCases.
   38: %%% If GroupPath is the latter, the last group in the list must be
   39: %%% the "terminating" group in the path, or it will be impossible to
   40: %%% execute test cases in higher level groups *only*, as in this case:
   41: %%% groups() -> [{g1,[],[tc1,{g2,[],[tc2]}]}].
   42: %%% Compare: find_groups(x, g1, all, groups()), and
   43: %%%          find_groups(x, [[g1]], all, groups())
   44: %%%
   45: %%% Some examples:
   46: %%%
   47: %%% GroupPaths = g1, means find all paths with g1 included
   48: %%% GroupPaths = [g1], -''-
   49: %%% GroupPaths = [g1,g2], search twice - once for g1 and once for g2
   50: %%% GroupPaths = [[g1,g2]], find cases under group g1 and sub group g2
   51: %%% GroupPaths = [[g1,g2],[g1,g3]], find cases for g1-g2 AND g1-g3
   52: %%%
   53: %%% TestCases = all | atom() | [atom()]
   54: %%%
   55: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   56: 
   57: -module(ct_groups_search_SUITE).
   58: 
   59: -compile(export_all).
   60: 
   61: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   62: -include_lib("common_test/src/ct_util.hrl").
   63: 
   64: 
   65: -define(eh, ct_test_support_eh).
   66: 
   67: -define(M1, groups_search_dummy_1_SUITE).
   68: -define(M2, groups_search_dummy_2_SUITE).
   69: 
   70: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   71: %% TEST SERVER CALLBACK FUNCTIONS
   72: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   73: 
   74: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   75:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   76:     code:add_patha(DataDir),
   77:     M1Erl = filename:join(DataDir, atom_to_list(?M1)++".erl"),
   78:     M2Erl = filename:join(DataDir, atom_to_list(?M2)++".erl"),
   79:     {ok,?M1} = compile:file(M1Erl, [{outdir,DataDir}]),
   80:     {ok,?M2} = compile:file(M2Erl, [{outdir,DataDir}]),
   81:     {module,?M1} = code:load_file(?M1),
   82:     {module,?M2} = code:load_file(?M2),
   83: 
   84:     Config1 = ct_test_support:init_per_suite(Config),
   85:     Config1.
   86: 
   87: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   88:     ct_test_support:end_per_suite(Config).
   89: 
   90: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   91:     ct_test_support:init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config).
   92: 
   93: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   94:     ct_test_support:end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config).
   95: 
   96: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   97: 
   98: groups() -> 
   99:     [
  100:      {find_groups,[],[all_groups,
  101: 		      testcases_in_all_groups,
  102: 		      all_in_top_group1,
  103: 		      all_in_top_group2,
  104: 		      all_in_sub_group1,
  105: 		      all_in_sub_group2,
  106: 		      testcase_in_top_group1,
  107: 		      testcase_in_top_group2,
  108: 		      testcase_in_sub_group1,
  109: 		      testcase_in_sub_group2,
  110: 		      testcase_in_top_groups1,
  111: 		      testcase_in_top_groups2,
  112: 		      testcase_in_top_groups3,
  113: 		      testcase_in_top_groups4,
  114: 		      testcase_in_top_groups5,
  115: 		      testcase_in_top_groups6,
  116: 		      testcase_in_top_groups7,
  117: 		      testcase_in_sub_groups1,
  118: 		      testcase_in_sub_groups2,
  119: 		      testcase_in_sub_groups3,
  120: 		      testcase_in_sub_groups4,
  121: 		      testcase_in_sub_groups5,
  122: 		      testcase_in_sub_groups6,
  123: 		      testcase_in_sub_groups7,
  124: 		      testcase_in_sub_groups8,
  125: 		      testcase_in_sub_groups9,
  126: 		      testcase_in_sub_groups10,
  127: 		      testcase_in_sub_groups11,
  128: 		      testcase_in_sub_groups12,
  129: 		      testcase_in_sub_groups13,
  130: 		      bad_testcase_in_sub_groups1]},
  131: 
  132:      {run_groups,[sequence],[run_groups_with_options,
  133: 			     run_groups_with_testspec]}
  134:     ].
  135: 
  136: all() ->
  137:     [{group,find_groups,[parallel]},
  138:      {group,run_groups}].
  139: 
  140: 
  141: 
  142: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  143: %% TEST CASES CHECKING RETURN VALUE ONLY
  144: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  145: 
  146: all_groups(_) ->
  147:     GPath = all, TCs = all,
  148: 
  149:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M1, GPath, TCs, groups1()),
  150:     
  151:     Top1 = ct_groups:find_groups(?M1, top1, TCs, groups1()),
  152:     Top2 = ct_groups:find_groups(?M1, top2, TCs, groups1()),
  153:     
  154:     All = Top1 ++ Top2 ++ [{conf,[{name,sub2}],
  155:  			    {?M1,init_per_group},
  156:  			    [{?M1,sub2_tc1},{?M1,sub2_tc2}],
  157:  			    {?M1,end_per_group}}],
  158: 
  159:     All = Found,
  160: 
  161:     {?M1,GPath,TCs,Top1++Top2}.
  162: 
  163: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  164: %%%
  165: testcases_in_all_groups(_) ->
  166:     GPath = all, TCs = [tc3,sub_tc2],
  167: 
  168:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M2, GPath, TCs, groups2()),
  169: 
  170:     [Top1 =
  171: 	 {conf,[{name,top1}],{?M2,init_per_group},
  172: 	  [{?M2,tc3},
  173: 	   {conf,[{name,sub11}],
  174: 	    {?M2,init_per_group},[{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2}],
  175: 	    {?M2,end_per_group}},
  176: 	   {conf,[{name,sub12}],
  177: 	    {?M2,init_per_group},
  178: 	    [{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2},
  179: 	     {conf,[{name,sub121}],
  180: 	      {?M2,init_per_group},[{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2}],
  181: 	      {?M2,end_per_group}}],
  182: 	    {?M2,end_per_group}}],
  183: 	  {?M2,end_per_group}},
  184:      
  185:      Top2 =
  186: 	 {conf,[{name,top2}],{?M2,init_per_group},
  187: 	  [{?M2,tc3},
  188: 	   {conf,[{name,sub21}],
  189: 	    {?M2,init_per_group},
  190: 	    [{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2},
  191: 	     {conf,[{name,sub2xx}],
  192: 	      {?M2,init_per_group},[{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2}],
  193: 	      {?M2,end_per_group}}],
  194: 	    {?M2,end_per_group}},
  195: 	   
  196: 	   {conf,[{name,sub22}],
  197: 	    {?M2,init_per_group},
  198: 	    [{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2},
  199: 	     {conf,[{name,sub221}],
  200: 	      {?M2,init_per_group},[{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2}],
  201: 	      {?M2,end_per_group}},
  202: 	     {conf,[{name,sub2xx}],
  203: 	      {?M2,init_per_group},[{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2}],
  204: 	      {?M2,end_per_group}}],
  205: 	    {?M2,end_per_group}}],
  206: 	  {?M2,end_per_group}},
  207: 
  208:      {conf,[{name,sub21}],
  209:       {?M2,init_per_group},
  210:       [{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2},
  211:        {conf,[{name,sub2xx}],
  212: 	{?M2,init_per_group},[{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2}],{?M2,end_per_group}}],
  213:       {?M2,end_per_group}},
  214: 
  215:      {conf,[{name,sub22}],
  216:       {?M2,init_per_group},
  217:       [{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2},
  218:        {conf,[{name,sub221}],
  219: 	{?M2,init_per_group},[{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2}],{?M2,end_per_group}},
  220:        {conf,[{name,sub2xx}],
  221: 	{?M2,init_per_group},[{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2}],{?M2,end_per_group}}],
  222:       {?M2,end_per_group}},
  223: 
  224:      {conf,[{name,sub221}],
  225:       {?M2,init_per_group},[{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2}],{?M2,end_per_group}},
  226: 
  227:      {conf,[{name,sub2xx}],
  228:       {?M2,init_per_group},[{?M2,tc3},{?M2,sub_tc2}],{?M2,end_per_group}}]
  229: 
  230: 	= Found,
  231: 
  232:     {?M2,GPath,TCs,[Top1,Top2]}.
  233: 
  234: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  235: %%% 
  236: all_in_top_group1(_) ->
  237:     GPath= top1, TCs = all,
  238: 
  239:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M1, GPath, TCs, groups1()),
  240: 
  241:     [{conf,[{name,top1}],
  242:       {?M1,init_per_group},
  243:       [{?M1,top1_tc1},{?M1,top1_tc2},
  244:        {conf,[{name,sub1}],
  245: 	{?M1,init_per_group},
  246: 	[{?M1,sub1_tc1},{?M1,sub1_tc2}],
  247: 	{?M1,end_per_group}}],
  248:       {?M1,end_per_group}}] = Found,
  249: 
  250:     {?M1,GPath,TCs,Found}.
  251: 
  252: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  253: %%% 
  254: all_in_top_group2(_) ->
  255:     GPath= top2, TCs = all,
  256: 
  257:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M1, GPath, TCs, groups1()),
  258: 
  259:     [{conf,[{name,top2}],
  260:       {?M1,init_per_group},
  261:       [{conf,[{name,sub2}],
  262: 	{?M1,init_per_group},
  263: 	[{?M1,sub2_tc1},{?M1,sub2_tc2}],
  264: 	{?M1,end_per_group}},
  265:        {?M1,top2_tc1},{?M1,top2_tc2}],
  266:       {?M1,end_per_group}}] = Found,
  267: 
  268:     {?M1,GPath,TCs,Found}.
  269: 
  270: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  271: %%% 
  272: all_in_sub_group1(_) ->
  273:     GPath = sub1, TCs = all,
  274: 
  275:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M1, GPath, TCs, groups1()),
  276: 
  277:     [{conf,[{name,top1}],
  278:       {?M1,init_per_group},
  279:       [{conf,[{name,sub1}],
  280: 	{?M1,init_per_group},
  281: 	[{?M1,sub1_tc1},{?M1,sub1_tc2}],
  282: 	{?M1,end_per_group}}],
  283:       {?M1,end_per_group}}] = Found,
  284: 
  285:     {?M1,GPath,TCs,Found}.
  286: 
  287: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  288: %%% 
  289: all_in_sub_group2(_) ->
  290:     GPath = sub2, TCs = all,
  291: 
  292:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M1, GPath, TCs, groups1()),
  293: 
  294:     [Top2 =
  295: 	 {conf,[{name,top2}],
  296: 	  {?M1,init_per_group},
  297: 	  [{conf,[{name,sub2}],
  298: 	    {?M1,init_per_group},
  299: 	    [{?M1,sub2_tc1},{?M1,sub2_tc2}],
  300: 	    {?M1,end_per_group}}],
  301: 	  {?M1,end_per_group}},
  302:      
  303:      {conf,[{name,sub2}],
  304:       {?M1,init_per_group},
  305:       [{?M1,sub2_tc1},{?M1,sub2_tc2}],
  306:       {?M1,end_per_group}}] = Found,
  307:     
  308:     {?M1,GPath,TCs,Top2}.
  309: 
  310: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  311: %%%
  312: testcase_in_top_group1(_) ->
  313:     GPath = top1, TCs = [top1_tc2],
  314: 
  315:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M1, GPath, TCs, groups1()),
  316: 
  317:     [{conf,[{name,top1}],
  318:       {?M1,init_per_group},
  319:       [{?M1,top1_tc2}],
  320:       {?M1,end_per_group}}] = Found,
  321: 
  322:     {?M1,GPath,TCs,Found}.
  323: 
  324: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  325: %%%
  326: testcase_in_top_group2(_) ->
  327:     GPath = top2, TCs = [top2_tc2],
  328: 
  329:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M1, GPath, TCs, groups1()),
  330: 
  331:     [{conf,[{name,top2}],
  332:       {?M1,init_per_group},
  333:       [{?M1,top2_tc2}],
  334:       {?M1,end_per_group}}] = Found,
  335: 
  336:     {?M1,GPath,TCs,Found}.
  337: 
  338: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  339: %%%
  340: testcase_in_sub_group1(_) ->
  341:     GPath = sub1, TCs = [sub1_tc2],
  342: 
  343:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M1, GPath, TCs, groups1()),
  344: 
  345:     [{conf,[{name,top1}],
  346:       {?M1,init_per_group},
  347:       [{conf,[{name,sub1}],
  348: 	{?M1,init_per_group},
  349: 	[{?M1,sub1_tc2}],
  350: 	{?M1,end_per_group}}],
  351:       {?M1,end_per_group}}] = Found,
  352: 
  353:     {?M1,GPath,TCs,Found}.
  354: 
  355: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  356: %%%
  357: testcase_in_sub_group2(_) ->
  358:     GPath = sub2, TCs = [sub2_tc2],
  359: 
  360:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M1, GPath, TCs, groups1()),
  361: 
  362:     [Top2 =
  363: 	 {conf,[{name,top2}],
  364: 	  {?M1,init_per_group},
  365: 	  [{conf,[{name,sub2}],
  366: 	    {?M1,init_per_group},
  367: 	    [{?M1,sub2_tc2}],
  368: 	    {?M1,end_per_group}}],
  369: 	  {?M1,end_per_group}},
  370:      
  371:      {conf,[{name,sub2}],
  372:       {?M1,init_per_group},
  373:       [{?M1,sub2_tc2}],
  374:       {?M1,end_per_group}}] = Found,
  375:     
  376:     {?M1,GPath,TCs,Top2}.
  377: 
  378: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  379: %%%
  380: testcase_in_top_groups1(_) ->
  381:     GPath = [top1,top2], TCs = all,
  382: 
  383:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M2, GPath, TCs, groups2()),
  384: 
  385:     [{conf,[{name,top1}],
  386:       {?M2,init_per_group},
  387:       [{?M2,top1_tc1},{?M2,top_tc2},{?M2,tc3},
  388:        {conf,[{name,sub11}],
  389: 	{?M2,init_per_group},
  390: 	[{?M2,sub11_tc1},{?M2,sub_tc2},{?M2,tc3}],
  391: 	{?M2,end_per_group}},
  392:        {conf,[{name,sub12}],
  393: 	{?M2,init_per_group},
  394: 	[{?M2,sub12_tc1},{?M2,sub_tc2},{?M2,tc3},
  395: 	 {conf,[{name,sub121}],
  396: 	  {?M2,init_per_group},
  397: 	  [{?M2,sub121_tc1},{?M2,sub_tc2},{?M2,tc3}],
  398: 	  {?M2,end_per_group}}],
  399: 	{?M2,end_per_group}}],
  400:       {?M2,end_per_group}},
  401:      
  402:      {conf,[{name,top2}],
  403:       {?M2,init_per_group},
  404:       [{conf,[{name,sub21}],
  405: 	{?M2,init_per_group},
  406: 	[{?M2,sub21_tc1},{?M2,sub_tc2},{?M2,tc3},
  407: 	 {conf,[{name,sub2xx}],
  408: 	  {?M2,init_per_group},
  409: 	  [{?M2,sub2xx_tc1},{?M2,sub_tc2},{?M2,tc3}],
  410: 	  {?M2,end_per_group}}],
  411: 	{?M2,end_per_group}},
  412:        {?M2,top2_tc1},{?M2,top_tc2},{?M2,tc3},
  413:        {conf,[{name,sub22}],
  414: 	{?M2,init_per_group},
  415: 	[{conf,[{name,sub221}],
  416: 	  {?M2,init_per_group},
  417: 	  [{?M2,sub221_tc1},{?M2,sub_tc2},{?M2,tc3}],
  418: 	  {?M2,end_per_group}},
  419: 	 {?M2,sub22_tc1},{?M2,sub_tc2},{?M2,tc3},
  420: 	 {conf,[{name,sub2xx}],
  421: 	  {?M2,init_per_group},
  422: 	  [{?M2,sub2xx_tc1},{?M2,sub_tc2},{?M2,tc3}],
  423: 	  {?M2,end_per_group}}],
  424: 	{?M2,end_per_group}}],
  425:       {?M2,end_per_group}}] = Found,
  426: 
  427:     {?M2,GPath,TCs,Found}.
  428: 
  429: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  430: %%%
  431: testcase_in_top_groups2(_) ->
  432:     GPath = [top1,top2], TCs = tc3,
  433: 
  434:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M2, GPath, TCs, groups2()),
  435: 
  436:     [{conf,[{name,top1}],
  437:       {?M2,init_per_group},
  438:       [{?M2,tc3},
  439:        {conf,[{name,sub11}],
  440: 	{?M2,init_per_group},
  441: 	[{?M2,tc3}],
  442: 	{?M2,end_per_group}},
  443:        {conf,[{name,sub12}],
  444: 	{?M2,init_per_group},
  445: 	[{?M2,tc3},
  446: 	 {conf,[{name,sub121}],
  447: 	  {?M2,init_per_group},
  448: 	  [{?M2,tc3}],
  449: 	  {?M2,end_per_group}}],
  450: 	{?M2,end_per_group}}],
  451:       {?M2,end_per_group}},
  452: 
  453:      {conf,[{name,top2}],
  454:       {?M2,init_per_group},
  455:       [{?M2,tc3},
  456:        {conf,[{name,sub21}],
  457: 	{?M2,init_per_group},
  458: 	[{?M2,tc3},
  459: 	 {conf,[{name,sub2xx}],
  460: 	  {?M2,init_per_group},
  461: 	  [{?M2,tc3}],
  462: 	  {?M2,end_per_group}}],
  463: 	{?M2,end_per_group}},
  464:        
  465:        {conf,[{name,sub22}],
  466: 	{?M2,init_per_group},
  467: 	[{?M2,tc3},
  468: 	 {conf,[{name,sub221}],
  469: 	  {?M2,init_per_group},
  470: 	  [{?M2,tc3}],
  471: 	  {?M2,end_per_group}},	 
  472: 	 {conf,[{name,sub2xx}],
  473: 	  {?M2,init_per_group},
  474: 	  [{?M2,tc3}],
  475: 	  {?M2,end_per_group}}],
  476: 	{?M2,end_per_group}}],
  477:       {?M2,end_per_group}}] = Found,
  478: 
  479:     {?M2,GPath,TCs,Found}.
  480: 
  481: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  482: %%%
  483: testcase_in_top_groups3(_) ->
  484:     GPath = [top1,top2], TCs = top1_tc1,
  485: 
  486:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M2, GPath, TCs, groups2()),
  487: 
  488:     [{conf,[{name,top1}],
  489:       {?M2,init_per_group},
  490:       [{?M2,top1_tc1}],
  491:       {?M2,end_per_group}}] = Found,
  492: 
  493:     {?M2,GPath,TCs,Found}.
  494: 
  495: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  496: %%%
  497: testcase_in_top_groups4(_) ->
  498:     GPath = [top1,top2], TCs = sub2xx_tc1,
  499: 
  500:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M2, GPath, TCs, groups2()),
  501: 
  502:     [{conf,[{name,top2}],
  503:       {?M2,init_per_group},
  504:       [{conf,[{name,sub21}],
  505: 	{?M2,init_per_group},
  506: 	[{conf,[{name,sub2xx}],
  507: 	  {?M2,init_per_group},
  508: 	  [{?M2,sub2xx_tc1}],
  509: 	  {?M2,end_per_group}}],
  510: 	{?M2,end_per_group}},
  511:        {conf,[{name,sub22}],
  512: 	{?M2,init_per_group},
  513: 	[{conf,[{name,sub2xx}],
  514: 	  {?M2,init_per_group},
  515: 	  [{?M2,sub2xx_tc1}],
  516: 	  {?M2,end_per_group}}],
  517: 	{?M2,end_per_group}}],
  518:       {?M2,end_per_group}}] = Found,
  519: 
  520:     {?M2,GPath,TCs,Found}.
  521:

  961: %%%
  962: bad_testcase_in_sub_groups1(_) ->
  963:     GPath = [sub2xx], TCs = [top2_tc1],
  964: 
  965:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M2, GPath, TCs, groups2()),
  966:

  968: 
  969:     {?M2,GPath,TCs,Found}.
  970: 
  971: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  972: %%%
  973: bad_testcase_in_sub_groups2(_) ->
  974:     GPath = [sub12,sub2xx], TCs = [top1_tc1,top2_tc1],
  975: 
  976:     Found = ct_groups:find_groups(?M2, GPath, TCs, groups2()),
  977: 
  978:     [] = Found,
  979: 
  980:     {?M2,GPath,TCs,Found}.
  981: 
  982: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  983: %%% CASES EXECUTING THE TESTS
  984: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  985: 
  986: run_groups_with_options(Config) ->
  987:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  988: 
  989:     {M1All,M1Rest,M2All,M2Rest} = get_all_groups_and_cases(Config),
  990: 
  991:     M1AllGrs = lists:flatmap(fun({Path,_,_}) when is_atom(hd(Path)) -> Path;
  992: 				({Path,_,_}) when is_list(hd(Path)) -> Path;
  993: 				({Path,_,_}) -> [Path]
  994: 			     end, M1All),
  995: 
  996:     %% ct:pal("NOW RUNNING M1 TEST: ~p", [M1All]),
  997: 
  998:     {OptsM11,ERPidM11} = setup([{dir,DataDir},{suite,?M1},
  999: 				{group,M1AllGrs},{label,m1_all_cases}], Config),
 1000:     M1AllGrInfo = {M1AllGrs,lists:flatten([Found || {_,_,Found} <- M1All])},
 1001:     ok = execute(m1_all_cases, M1AllGrInfo, OptsM11, ERPidM11, Config),
 1002: 
 1003:     lists:foldl(
 1004:       fun({GrPath,TCs,Found}, N) ->
 1005:     	      TestName = list_to_atom("m1_spec_cases_" ++ integer_to_list(N)),
 1006: 	      %% ct:pal("NOW RUNNING M1 TEST ~p: ~p + ~p",
 1007: 		%%     [TestName,GrPath,TCs]),
 1008:     	      {OptsM12,ERPidM12} = setup([{dir,DataDir},{suite,?M1},
 1009:     					  {group,GrPath},{testcase,TCs},
 1010:     					  {label,TestName}], Config),
 1011:     	      ok = execute(TestName, {GrPath,TCs,Found},
 1012:     			   OptsM12, ERPidM12, Config),
 1013:     	      N+1
 1014:       end, 1, M1Rest),
 1015:     
 1016:     %% ct:pal("NOW RUNNING M2 TEST: ~p", [M2All]),
 1017: 
 1018:     M2AllGrs = lists:flatmap(fun({Path,_,_}) when is_atom(hd(Path)) -> Path;
 1019: 				({Path,_,_}) when is_list(hd(Path)) -> Path;
 1020: 				({Path,_,_}) -> [Path]
 1021: 			     end, M2All),
 1022: 
 1023: 
 1024:     {OptsM21,ERPidM21} = setup([{dir,DataDir},{suite,?M2},
 1025:     				{group,M2AllGrs},{testcase,all},
 1026:     				{label,m2_all_cases}], Config),
 1027:     M2AllGrInfo = {M2AllGrs,lists:flatten([Found || {_,_,Found} <- M2All])},
 1028:     ok = execute(m2_all_cases, M2AllGrInfo, OptsM21, ERPidM21, Config),
 1029: 
 1030:     lists:foldl(
 1031:       fun({GrPath,TCs,Found}, N) ->
 1032:     	      TestName = list_to_atom("m2_spec_cases_" ++ integer_to_list(N)),
 1033:            %% ct:pal("NOW RUNNING M2 TEST ~p: ~p + ~p", [TestName,GrPath,TCs]),
 1034:     	      {OptsM22,ERPidM22} = setup([{dir,DataDir},{suite,?M2},
 1035:     					  {group,GrPath},{testcase,TCs},
 1036:     					  {label,TestName}], Config),
 1037:     	      ok = execute(TestName, {GrPath,TCs,Found},
 1038:     			   OptsM22, ERPidM22, Config),
 1039:     	      N+1
 1040:       end, 1, M2Rest),
 1041:     ok.
 1042: 
 1043: 
 1044: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1045: %%% 
 1046: run_groups_with_testspec(Config) ->
 1047:     Name = run_groups_with_testspec,
 1048:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
 1049:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
 1050: 
 1051:     {M1All,M1Rest,M2All,M2Rest} = get_all_groups_and_cases(Config),
 1052: 
 1053:     M1AllGrs = lists:flatmap(fun({Path,_,_}) when is_atom(hd(Path)) -> Path;
 1054: 				({Path,_,_}) when is_list(hd(Path)) -> Path;
 1055: 				({Path,_,_}) -> [Path]
 1056: 			     end, M1All),
 1057:     M1AllTerm =	{groups,DataDir,?M1,M1AllGrs},
 1058: 
 1059:     M1RestTerms = lists:map(
 1060: 		    fun({GrPath,TCs,_}) ->
 1061: 			    {groups,DataDir,?M1,GrPath,{cases,TCs}}
 1062: 		    end, M1Rest),
 1063: 
 1064:     M2AllGrs = lists:flatmap(fun({Path,_,_}) when is_atom(hd(Path)) -> Path;
 1065: 				({Path,_,_}) when is_list(hd(Path)) -> Path;
 1066: 				({Path,_,_}) -> [Path]
 1067: 			     end, M2All),
 1068:     M2AllTerm =	{groups,DataDir,?M2,M2AllGrs,{cases,all}},
 1069: 
 1070:     M2RestTerms = lists:map(
 1071: 		    fun({GrPath,TCs,_}) ->
 1072: 			    {groups,DataDir,?M2,GrPath,{cases,TCs}}
 1073: 		    end, M2Rest),
 1074: 
 1075:     GroupTerms = lists:flatten([M1AllTerm,
 1076: 				M1RestTerms,
 1077: 				M2AllTerm,
 1078: 				M2RestTerms]),
 1079: 
 1080:     TestSpec = [{merge_tests,false},
 1081: 		{label,Name}] ++ GroupTerms,
 1082: 
 1083:     ct:pal("Here's the test spec:~n~p", [TestSpec]),
 1084: 
 1085:     TestSpecName = ct_test_support:write_testspec(TestSpec, PrivDir,
 1086: 						  "groups_search_spec"),
 1087: 
 1088:     {Opts,ERPid} = setup([{spec,TestSpecName}], Config),
 1089:     GroupInfo = 
 1090: 	[{M1AllTerm,lists:flatten([Found || {_,_,Found} <- M1All])} |
 1091: 	 M1Rest] ++
 1092: 	[{M2AllTerm,lists:flatten([Found || {_,_,Found} <- M2All])} |
 1093: 	 M2Rest],
 1094:     ok = execute(Name, GroupInfo, Opts, ERPid, Config).
 1095: 
 1096: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1097: %%% HELP FUNCTIONS
 1098: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1099: 
 1100: groups1() ->
 1101:     [{top1,[],[top1_tc1,top1_tc2,{sub1,[],[sub1_tc1,sub1_tc2]}]},
 1102:      {top2,[],[{group,sub2},top2_tc1,top2_tc2]},
 1103:      {sub2,[],[sub2_tc1,sub2_tc2]}].
 1104: 
 1105: groups2() ->
 1106:     [{top1,[],[top1_tc1,top_tc2,tc3,
 1107: 	       {sub11,[],[sub11_tc1,sub_tc2,tc3]},
 1108: 	       {sub12,[],[sub12_tc1,sub_tc2,tc3,
 1109: 			  {sub121,[],[sub121_tc1,sub_tc2,tc3]}]}]},
 1110:      {top2,[],[{group,sub21},top2_tc1,top_tc2,tc3,{group,sub22}]},
 1111:      {sub21,[],[sub21_tc1,sub_tc2,tc3,{group,sub2xx}]},
 1112:      {sub22,[],[{group,sub221},sub22_tc1,sub_tc2,tc3,{group,sub2xx}]},
 1113:      {sub221,[],[sub221_tc1,sub_tc2,tc3]},
 1114:      {sub2xx,[],[sub2xx_tc1,sub_tc2,tc3]}].
 1115: 
 1116: get_all_groups_and_cases(Config) ->
 1117:     {value,{_,_,FindGrTCs}} = lists:keysearch(find_groups, 1, groups()),
 1118: 
 1119:     MGTFs = [apply(?MODULE, TC, [Config]) || TC <- FindGrTCs],
 1120: 
 1121:     ct:pal("Extracted data from ~p test cases", [length(MGTFs)]),
 1122: 
 1123:     lists:foldr(fun({M,Gs,TCs,F},
 1124: 		    {M11,M12,M21,M22}) ->
 1125: 			case {M,Gs,TCs} of
 1126: 			    {?M1,all,_} -> {M11,[{Gs,TCs,F}|M12],M21,M22};
 1127: 			    {?M1,_,all} -> {[{Gs,all,F}|M11],M12,M21,M22};
 1128: 			    {?M1,_,_} -> {M11,[{Gs,TCs,F}|M12],M21,M22};
 1129: 			    {?M2,all,_} -> {M11,M12,M21,[{Gs,TCs,F}|M22]};
 1130: 			    {?M2,_,all} -> {M11,M12,[{Gs,all,F}|M21],M22};
 1131: 			    {?M2,_,_} -> {M11,M12,M21,[{Gs,TCs,F}|M22]}
 1132: 			end
 1133: 		end, {[],[],[],[]}, MGTFs).
 1134:     
 1135: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1136: 
 1137: setup(Test, Config) ->
 1138:     Opts0 = ct_test_support:get_opts(Config),
 1139:     Level = ?config(trace_level, Config),
 1140:     EvHArgs = [{cbm,ct_test_support},{trace_level,Level}],
 1141:     Opts = Opts0 ++ [{event_handler,{?eh,EvHArgs}}|Test],
 1142:     ERPid = ct_test_support:start_event_receiver(Config),
 1143:     {Opts,ERPid}.
 1144: 
 1145: execute(Name, TestParams, Opts, ERPid, Config) ->
 1146:     ok = ct_test_support:run(Opts, Config),
 1147:     Events = ct_test_support:get_events(ERPid, Config),
 1148:     Events1 = reformat(Events, ?eh),
 1149:     ct_test_support:log_events(Name, 
 1150: 			       Events1,
 1151: 			       ?config(priv_dir, Config),
 1152: 			       Opts),
 1153:     verify_events(Name, TestParams, Events1).
 1154: 
 1155: reformat(Events, EH) ->
 1156:     ct_test_support:reformat(Events, EH).
 1157: 
 1158: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1159: %%% TEST EVENTS
 1160: verify_events(Name, Params, Events) ->
 1161:     %% 2 tests (ct:run_test + script_start) is default
 1162:     verify_events(Name, Params, Events, 2).
 1163: 
 1164: verify_events(_, _, _, 0) ->
 1165:     ok;
 1166: verify_events(Name, Params, Events, N) ->
 1167:     test_events(Name, Params, Events),
 1168:     verify_events(Name, Params, Events, N-1).
 1169: 
 1170: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1171: %%% check run_groups_with_options
 1172: 
 1173: test_events(TestName, {GrPath,Found}, Events) ->
 1174:     test_events(TestName, {GrPath,all,Found}, Events);
 1175: 
 1176: test_events(TestName, {GrPath,TCs,Found}, Events)
 1177:   when TestName /= run_groups_with_testspec ->
 1178:     try check_events(Events, flatten_tests(Found)) of
 1179: 	ok -> ok
 1180:     catch
 1181: 	throw:Reason ->
 1182: 	    ct:pal("Test failed for ~p with group path ~p and cases ~p"
 1183: 		   "~nReason: ~p", [TestName,GrPath,TCs,Reason]),
 1184: 	    throw(failed)
 1185:     end;
 1186: 
 1187: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1188: %%% check run_groups_with_testspec
 1189: 
 1190: test_events(run_groups_with_testspec, Params, Events) ->
 1191:     AllFound = lists:flatmap(fun({_All,Found}) when is_tuple(Found) ->
 1192: 				     [Found];
 1193: 				({_All,Found}) -> 
 1194: 				     Found;
 1195: 				({_Gr,_TCs,Found}) when is_tuple(Found) ->
 1196: 				     [Found];
 1197: 				({_Gr,_TCs,Found}) ->
 1198: 				     Found
 1199: 			     end, Params),
 1200:     try check_events(Events, flatten_tests(AllFound)) of
 1201: 	ok -> ok
 1202:     catch
 1203: 	throw:Reason ->
 1204: 	    ct:pal("Test failed for run_groups_with_testspec."
 1205: 		   "~nReason: ~p", [Reason]),
 1206: 	    throw(failed)
 1207:     end.
 1208: 
 1209: flatten_tests({conf,[{name,G}|_],{Mod,_I},Tests,_E}) ->
 1210:     lists:flatten([{group,Mod,G} | flatten_tests(Tests)]);
 1211: flatten_tests([{conf,[{name,G}|_],{Mod,_I},Tests,_E} | Confs]) ->
 1212:     lists:flatten([{group,Mod,G} | flatten_tests(Tests)]) ++
 1213: 	lists:flatten(flatten_tests(Confs));
 1214: flatten_tests([{_Mod,_TC} = Case | Tests]) ->
 1215:     lists:flatten([Case | flatten_tests(Tests)]); 
 1216: flatten_tests([]) ->
 1217:     [].
 1218: 
 1219: check_events([{_,tc_start,{Mod,{init_per_group,G,_}}} | Evs],
 1220: 	     [{group,Mod,G} | Check]) ->
 1221:     check_events(Evs, Check);
 1222: check_events([{_,tc_start,{Mod,TC}} | Evs],
 1223: 	     [{Mod,TC} | Check]) when is_atom(TC) ->
 1224:     check_events(Evs, Check);
 1225: check_events([{_,tc_start,{Mod,{init_per_group,G,_}}} | _Evs], Check) ->
 1226:     ct:pal("CHECK FAILED!~nGroup ~p in ~p not found in ~p.",
 1227: 	   [G,Mod,Check]),
 1228:     throw({test_not_found,{Mod,G}});
 1229: check_events([{_,tc_start,{Mod,TC}} | _Evs], Check)
 1230:   when is_atom(TC), TC /= init_per_suite, TC /= end_per_suite ->
 1231:     ct:pal("CHECK FAILED!~nCase ~p in ~p not found in ~p.",
 1232: 	   [TC,Mod,Check]),
 1233:     throw({test_not_found,{Mod,TC}});
 1234: check_events([Group | Evs], Check) when is_list(Group) ->
 1235:     Check1 = check_events(Group, Check),
 1236:     check_events(Evs, Check1);
 1237: check_events(_, []) ->
 1238:     ok;
 1239: check_events([Elem | Evs], Check) when is_tuple(Elem) ->
 1240:     check_events(Evs, Check);
 1241: check_events([], Check = [_|_]) ->
 1242:     ct:pal("CHECK FAILED!~nTests remain: ~p", [Check]),
 1243:     throw({tests_remain,Check});
 1244: check_events([Wut | _],_) ->
 1245:     throw({unexpected,Wut}).
 1246:
